message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1000000.  This is a significant investment, but I'm confident you'll see the incredible return on your investment.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $950000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to come in a bit higher than $950000 to make this work for me.  I'm willing to go down to $975000.  This represents a significant discount from my original offer, and I truly believe this product is worth the investment.  Let's see if we can bridge this gap.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still working within my budget constraints. I am willing to pay $960000 for the product. I hope this proposal is closer to what you're looking for.
